title.rendered: Divya Khosla Kumar turns Santa for Smile Foundation kids

content.rendered:
Popular actress, producer and director Divya Khosla Kumar spent a gala day with Smile Foundation children by turning Santa for them. The celebrations were a part of the initiative “Phoenix Turns Santa” a unique online campaign by the retail establishment Phoenix, that aims to donate funds to Smile Foundation based on the impressions generated on social media during the Christmas week.

Divya also distributed gifts to the kids from Smile Foundation and had a funny time interacting with them. Smile Foundation is an NGO in India directly benefitting over 600,000 children and their families every year, through more than 250 live welfare projects on education, healthcare, livelihood and women empowerment, in over 950 remote villages and slums across 25 states of India.
